ComicInfo.Title: Echo; Frank and the Sugar of Vengeance; The Stairs; Peeker; Dive Deep
ComicInfo.Summary:
Echo: Jim's son wants to know if he's ever killed someone.
Frank and the Sugar of Vengeance: The Man-Pig ruins Frank's picnic.
The Stairs: Jim meets a creature from his past.
Peeker: Frank looks through windows.
Dive Deep: Should the swimming woman trust the frog?
